title: My migration
name: My migration
description:
A Map by Butterworth

where I have lived...so far.

properties.description: Posted by LevithonFT Sam houston , Texas

properties.name: The house we rented in Bel Air
properties.description: Posted by Butterworth 2691 basil ln, bel air caThis is where we first rented in LA from 1995 to 1998. My oldest daughter was born while we lived here in 1997.

properties.name: Where I lived after getting married
properties.description: Posted by Butterworth3051 Anthony Dr, decatur gaMy wife owned the place, go figure- 1991 to 1995

properties.name: Where I lived as a baby
properties.description: Posted by Butterworth 301 north ave, gainseville GALived here with Mom from 1965-67?, while Dad was in Vietnam. When he came back, he brought me an ice cream cone.

properties.name: Where I lived as a little kid
properties.description: Posted by Butterworth  holly hill rd, augusta gaLived here from about 1967 to the summer of 1970

properties.name: Where I lived during the last years of college
properties.description: Posted by Butterworth   1985 brian way, decatur gaThis is where I lived with Kenny, Joel and David A. Lane from 1985 to 1991. Before I got married...

properties.description: Posted by Butterworthfort sam houston, txBorn on an Army Base in September of 1965 just before Dad went to Vietnam.
